summary: This is an internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are dated January 3, 2020, and reference a promo on the 60 Minutes website regarding Epstein's death.

events.title: Internal discussion of potential 60 Minutes feature
events.description: Internal email chain within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing that 60 Minutes might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein that Sunday night, with a promo already on their website.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ email chain discusses media coverage of Epstein case in January 2020.
Email indicates 60 Minutes was planning a feature on Jeffrey Epstein around January 5, 2020.
The email references a promo on the 60 Minutes website regarding Epstein's death.
Communication is between personnel within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email shows DOJ awareness of and interest in media coverage of the Epstein case.
